title: Mike Spinelli
description:
Mike Spinelli is an O.G. in the world of online automotive journalism. He worked at 0-60 Magazine with Brian Scotto (of the Hoonigan Empire), and was the first writer at Jalopnik.  He currently hosts "After/DRIVE",  does video reviews for TheDRIVE.com, and is one of the hosts of "/DRIVE on NBC Sports".

 

This show is available as a video!

https://youtu.be/EztsRTwhM_w

Mike on IG: https://www.instagram.com/mikespinelli/

Mike on Twitter: https://twitter.com/mikespin

Mike on The DRIVE: http://www.thedrive.com/author/mike-spinelli
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
